general_insights: Users appreciate when assistants provide specific, actionable advice that aligns with their stated needs.
Clarifying user preferences early in the conversation can lead to more satisfying interactions.
Maintaining a supportive tone and offering follow-up assistance can sustain high user satisfaction.
